1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Split lists.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.List.Split
6  ( -- * Type
7    Split1, SplitList1,
8    Split2, SplitList2,
9    Split3e, SplitList3e,
10    Split3, SplitList3,
11
12    -- * Split
13    dropSubBy, dropSub,
14    splitSubBy, splitSub,
15    splitBy,
16
17    -- * Divide
18    chunks,
19    divide, divideBy, wordsBy,
20  ) where
21
22
23-- --------------------------------------------  Type
24
25-- | Split elements into subelements.
26type Split1 t a = t a -> Maybe (t a)
27
28-- | Split list into sublist.
29type SplitList1 a = Split1 [] a
30
31-- | Split elements into two subelements.
32type Split2 t a = t a -> Maybe (t a, t a)
33
34-- | Split list into two sublists.
35type SplitList2 a = Split2 [] a
36
37-- | Split elements into before-elem-after parts.
38type Split3e t a = t a -> Maybe (t a, a, t a)
39
40-- | Split list into before-elem-after parts.
41type SplitList3e a = Split3e [] a
42
43-- | Split elements into three subelements.
44type Split3 t a = t a -> Maybe (t a, t a, t a)
45
46-- | Split list into three sublists.
47type SplitList3 a = Split3 [] a
48
49
50-- --------------------------------------------  Split
51
52-- | Drop sublist.
53dropSubBy :: SplitList2 a -> SplitList1 a
54dropSubBy p s = case p s of
55                  Just (_, b) -> Just b
56                  Nothing     -> Nothing
57
58-- | Drop prefix part from a list.
59--   This function is similar to 'Data.List.stripPrefix'.
60--
61--   >>> dropSub "abc" "abcdefghi"
62--   Just "defghi"
63--
64--   >>> dropSub "" "abcdefghi"
65--   Just "abcdefghi"
66--
67--   >>> dropSub "xyz" "abcdefghi"
68--   Nothing
69
70dropSub :: (Eq a) => [a] -> SplitList1 a
71dropSub sub = dropSubBy p where
72    n = length sub
73    p xs | take n xs == sub  = Just (sub, drop n xs)
74         | otherwise         = Nothing
75
76-- | Split list by given predicate.
77splitSubBy :: SplitList2 a -> SplitList3 a
78splitSubBy p = loop [] where
79    loop _ [] = Nothing
80    loop before xxs@(x : xs) =
81        case p xxs of
82          Nothing            -> loop (x : before) xs
83          Just (mid, after)  -> Just (reverse before, mid, after)
84
85-- | Split list by given sublist.
86--
87--   >>> splitSub "def" "abcdefghi"
88--   Just ("abc","def","ghi")
89--
90--   >>> splitSub "" "abcdefghi"
91--  Just ("","","abcdefghi")
92
93splitSub :: (Eq a) => [a] -> SplitList3 a
94splitSub sub = splitSubBy p where
95    n = length sub
96    p xs | take n xs == sub  = Just (sub, drop n xs)
97         | otherwise         = Nothing
98
99-- | Split list by predicate.
100--
101--   >>> splitBy (== '|') "b c"
102--   Left "b c"
103--
104--   >>> splitBy (== '|') "a | b | c"
105--   Right ("a ", '|', " b | c")
106
107splitBy :: (a -> Bool) -> SplitList3e a
108splitBy p xs =
109    case break p xs of
110      (a, x : b) -> Just (a, x, b)
111      _          -> Nothing
112
113
114-- --------------------------------------------  Divide
115
116-- | Divide list into sublists of given length.
117--
118--   >>> chunks 2 "abcdefg"
119--   ["ab","cd","ef","g"]
120
121chunks :: Int -> [a] -> [[a]]
122chunks n = loop where
123    loop xs = case splitAt n xs of
124                ([], _)      -> []
125                (taked, xs2) -> taked : loop xs2
126
127-- | Divide list.
128--
129--   >>> divide '|' "a|bb||ccc|"
130--   ["a", "bb", "", "ccc", ""]
131
132divide :: (Eq a) => a -> [a] -> [[a]]
133divide dv = divideBy (== dv)
134
135-- | Divide list.
136--
137--   >>> divideBy (== '|') "a|bb||ccc|"
138--   ["a", "bb", "", "ccc", ""]
139
140divideBy :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [[a]]
141divideBy p = loop where
142    loop xs = case break p xs of
143                (x, _ : xs2) -> x : loop xs2
144                (x, [])      -> [x]
145
146-- | Divide string into words.
147--
148--   >>> wordsBy (== '|') "a|bb||ccc|"
149--   ["a","bb","ccc"]
150
151wordsBy :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [[a]]
152wordsBy p = loop where
153    loop s = case dropWhile p s of
154               [] -> []
155               s1 -> let (w, s2) = break p s1
156                     in w : loop s2
